goal.ch: IM5023 is designed to provide an informed appreciation of digital brand management as an academic subject as well as an increasingly important management practice. Linked to this attempt are the following aims: (1) to provide students an understanding of the role and importance of brand management in a firm as a managerial challenge; (2) to lean the key steps of the analytical process to help grow a brand; (3) to understand the appropriate theories, models, and other tools to make better branding decisions; and (4) to prepare students to be future managers in different fields with good brand sense and knowledge. In additions, extending brand-related topics including internal branding, services marketing, and corporate social responsibility will also be covered.
